wikipedia_page.main: John Roach  (1862–unknown) was a Welsh international footballer. He scored twice on his only appearance for the Wales national team, against Ireland on 11 April 1885 in the 1884–85 British Home Championship. Wales won the match 8–2.

response: John Roach may refer to any of the following:
*John Roach (baseball) (1867–1934), former Major League Baseball pitcher
*John Roach (bishop) (1921–2003), bishop of the Catholic Church
*John Roach (English footballer), English footballer played for Manchester United, FC Sète, and Accrington Stanley.
